artist: Artist: Antoni Tàpies; Publisher: Maeght Éditeur, Paris
description: cream paper folded in half; front: blue ground with three black characters over a piece of white cloth tape with red on top; interior: yellow ground (? possibly staining) with orange "A" on L side and "T" on R side with blue lines below; back: applied maroon fabric with playing cards around the edges; Lender's archive #168
